item.description:

item.title: Lustful Traditional Massage Parlor 极道无赖:横滨按摩店篇
item.description:
Lustful Traditional Massage Parlor - Mothers and Daughters Addicted to Secret Services - [Steam] [WAKUWAKU]

Overview

剧情概要
  • 这是一个拥有丰富情色要素的模拟经营类游戏。 主角是一个黑社会成员，目前面临晋升考验，在30天内赚够1000万日元。 玩家将在白天管理经营按摩店，夜晚走上街头拉客宣传。当然你也可以选择在夜晚时间放松一下和其他女主角约会。 游戏的主要游玩形式为模拟经营以及用弹珠战斗。

  • 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说

item.description:
Self-defense Dojo Secret NTR Lesson [v1.9.10 + DLC] [WAKUWAKU]

Overview

剧情概要
  • This is a simulation-style erotic game with humorous elements incorporated. The protagonist, Kota Morimura, gets into trouble after sleeping with his yakuza girlfriend, prompting him to go into hiding for a while. During this period, he teaches self-defense techniques to girls at a judo dojo and starts reaching out to female students with his desires.
  • As a player, you will take on the role of a self-defense coach, teaching judo techniques to your students. During this time, you may encounter some dojo challenges. If your strength and skills are insufficient, you will need to earn money through simulated part-time mini-games to improve your basic attributes. This will better enable you to guide your students.​

item.description:
What a Legend! [v0.7.05] [MagicNuts]

Overview

剧情概要
  • The story is about a young man that goes to the biggest city of the realm to lose his virginity but ends up meeting a mysterious woman who sends him on an epic quest. A quest full of sexual encounters, unhappy housewives, beautiful damsels, comely magical creatures, and the chance to become a legend.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说
  • 角色立绘：手绘立绘
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美画风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.7.05
  • 发行日期：2025-02-26

Changelog

更新日志
  • After being attacked by Gomira and before checking the records, Karl will be bandaged when he’s in the background as you interact with the Passage - - - Permit office. He also only appears and talks about the place if he’s not bandaged
  • The maelstrom will now also be in the World Map during Myrtle and Rose’s stories
  • I changed a line of Kull where he talked about identifying as an orc since it was misunderstood as making fun of trans folks
  • After kissing the frog, Gomira will only be in the background when she’s in the forest
  • Gomira’s wanted poster in the village now has an alternative text line if you’ve met her
  • If you’ve met Gretta, she’ll bring the cookies to Karl herself Readded the changes in the introduction included in the 0.6.04 update (being 19, not fondling Lana’s breast as she’s asleep, etc.) which I had - - - - - accidentally removed from the 0.7 patch
  • Added two new optional conversations with Sev after you’ve done Gomira’s story
  • Added two new optional conversations with Karl since his existing comments about Simmone didn’t make sense anymore
  • Added Mei’s pubic hair to the threesome presex
  • Re-encoded Lana’s head from her first vaginal sex scene where some players had reported webp encoding issues
  • Fixed typos
  • Added a missing art from introduction (Lana sleeping on the bridge)
  • Aureola’s splahs art in the confirmation screen will only appear if you’ve finished Gomira’s story
  • 0.7.05
  • Fixed typos
  • Fixed the game version number in the Main Menu screen

  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

Overview

  • 某天，被住在隔壁的￥彩乃太太邀请共进晚餐…

  • 那天晚上，和彩乃太太还有她丈夫一起吃喝… 之后丈夫先生喝醉了，就那样睡了过去。 啊…糟了，看到彩乃太太的臀部后，我勃起了。
  • “那就没办法了呢～毕竟都说了要好好款待你的… 我得负起责任才行吧？”
  • 虽然不知道为什么，但我正在睡着的丈夫身旁和他太太做爱。 彩乃太太的臀部、胸部、小穴，全部都让人欲罢不能… 明明丈夫先生还在旁边睡着，我却在彩乃太太的身体里射了很多。
